txt.en: 'You'll find The Plough and Stars just up this hill. It's the best inn in the Northfarthing!'
'You won't find tastier beer than that served at The Plough and Stars, just up the hill.'
'You get a lot of folk from Scary up at The Plough and Stars. They don't have a proper inn, you know.'
'Brockenborings is known for two things: the wool of its sheep and the beer at The Plough and Stars.'
